attributes.action: Close Down The UK To The Rest Of The World Before Swineflu Hits Us
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Close Down The UK To The Rest Of The World Before swine flu infects us
2 cases have alredy be reported allready resulting in high fear factor to the Public of the United Kingdom
if we were to shut down the uk to the rest of the world by shutting down i mean toatly relying on our own resources
if we were to do this it would stip the threat of swine flu this gives us a better chance of surviving if it does become a extreme threat we will be safe 
after completing this shut down many actions may have to be took to ensure we stay healty and protected if needs be we start to gain resources and suplys now developing renewable energy sources so our country can carry on with a general flow of electricity if we do do this it will be safe for the uk and if every one does die everywhere else in the world we will be left ...

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
